name: SCNSphere
desc: A sphere (or ball or globe) geometry.

items.name: init(radius: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a sphere geometry with the specified radius.

items.name: var radius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the sphere. Animatable.

items.name: var isGeodesic: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value specifying whether SceneKit uses a geodesic polygon mesh to render the sphere.

items.name: var segmentCount: Int
items.desc: A number determining the detail of the polygon mesh SceneKit uses to render the sphere. Animatable.
